attributes.additional_details: Scotland, The big Companies and the EU now want to exit the UK. The politicians are at war over leadership. They lied. Why give us such a vote its destroying our country?  The government needs to step it NOW & VETO this Vote before it’s too late.STOP DESTROYING our FUTURE. Immigration is important but needs to be sorted within the EU together. You are not just breaking from the EU you are breaking our world. If you care about England, Ireland, Scotland and Wales Vote to stop this now!
attributes.background:
Well having had a weekend to reflect on the EU Referendum results “I AM SCARED BIG TIME” 
We need Someone in Government to VETO this Referendum before we destroy our great country.  We don't Want another Recession.
